SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r2].[Id], [r2].[BookId], [r2].[Comment], [r2].[CreatedAt], [r2].[IsApproved], [r2].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r2].[Rating], [r2].[UserId]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) AS [c], CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END AS [c0]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) DESC, CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r2] ON [b0].[Id] = [r2].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[c0] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id]

SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r2].[Id], [r2].[BookId], [r2].[Comment], [r2].[CreatedAt], [r2].[IsApproved], [r2].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r2].[Rating], [r2].[UserId]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) AS [c], CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END AS [c0]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) DESC, CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r2] ON [b0].[Id] = [r2].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[c0] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id]

SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r].[Id], [r].[BookId], [r].[Comment], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[IsApproved], [r].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r].[Rating], [r].[UserId], [o0].[Id], [o0].[BookId], [o0].[OrderId], [o0].[Quantity], [o0].[Total], [o0].[UnitPrice]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM([o].[Quantity]), 0)
        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) AS [c]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM([o].[Quantity]), 0)
        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]

SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r2].[Id], [r2].[BookId], [r2].[Comment], [r2].[CreatedAt], [r2].[IsApproved], [r2].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r2].[Rating], [r2].[UserId]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) AS [c], CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END AS [c0]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) DESC, CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r2] ON [b0].[Id] = [r2].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[c0] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id]

SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r].[Id], [r].[BookId], [r].[Comment], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[IsApproved], [r].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r].[Rating], [r].[UserId], [o0].[Id], [o0].[BookId], [o0].[OrderId], [o0].[Quantity], [o0].[Total], [o0].[UnitPrice]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM([o].[Quantity]), 0)
        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) AS [c]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM([o].[Quantity]), 0)
        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]

LEFT JOIN [OrderItems] AS [o0] ON [b0].[Id] = [o0].[BookId]

FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) AS [c], CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END AS [c0]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) DESC, CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r2] ON [b0].[Id] = [r2].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[c0] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id]

SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r2].[Id], [r2].[BookId], [r2].[Comment], [r2].[CreatedAt], [r2].[IsApproved], [r2].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r2].[Rating], [r2].[UserId]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) AS [c], CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END AS [c0]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) DESC, CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r2] ON [b0].[Id] = [r2].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[c0] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id]

FROM (
    SELECT [r].[Id], [r].[BookId], [r].[Comment], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[IsApproved], [r].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r].[Rating], [r].[UserId]
    FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
    WHERE [r].[IsApproved] = CAST(1 AS bit)
    ORDER BY [r].[CreatedAt] DESC
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [r0]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [r0].[UserId] = [a].[Id]
INNER JOIN [Books] AS [b] ON [r0].[BookId] = [b].[Id]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
ORDER BY [r0].[CreatedAt] DESC

SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r2].[Id], [r2].[BookId], [r2].[Comment], [r2].[CreatedAt], [r2].[IsApproved], [r2].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r2].[Rating], [r2].[UserId]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) AS [c], CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END AS [c0]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) DESC, CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r2] ON [b0].[Id] = [r2].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[c0] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id]

SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r].[Id], [r].[BookId], [r].[Comment], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[IsApproved], [r].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r].[Rating], [r].[UserId], [o0].[Id], [o0].[BookId], [o0].[OrderId], [o0].[Quantity], [o0].[Total], [o0].[UnitPrice]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM([o].[Quantity]), 0)
        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) AS [c]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM([o].[Quantity]), 0)
        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r] ON [b0].[Id] = [r].[BookId]
LEFT JOIN [OrderItems] AS [o0] ON [b0].[Id] = [o0].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id], [r].[Id]

FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (

        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) AS [c]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM([o].[Quantity]), 0)
        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r] ON [b0].[Id] = [r].[BookId]
LEFT JOIN [OrderItems] AS [o0] ON [b0].[Id] = [o0].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id], [r].[Id]

FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) AS [c], CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END AS [c0]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) DESC, CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END DESC
) AS [b0]

        SELECT COALESCE(SUM([o].[Quantity]), 0)
        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r] ON [b0].[Id] = [r].[BookId]
LEFT JOIN [OrderItems] AS [o0] ON [b0].[Id] = [o0].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id], [r].[Id]
2025-09-20 04:02:07.632 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r2].[Id], [r2].[BookId], [r2].[Comment], [r2].[CreatedAt], [r2].[IsApproved], [r2].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r2].[Rating], [r2].[UserId]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) AS [c], CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END AS [c0]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) DESC, CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r2] ON [b0].[Id] = [r2].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[c0] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id]

    FROM [Books] AS [b]

        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) DESC

SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r2].[Id], [r2].[BookId], [r2].[Comment], [r2].[CreatedAt], [r2].[IsApproved], [r2].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r2].[Rating], [r2].[UserId]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) AS [c], CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END AS [c0]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) DESC, CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r2] ON [b0].[Id] = [r2].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[c0] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id]

SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r2].[Id], [r2].[BookId], [r2].[Comment], [r2].[CreatedAt], [r2].[IsApproved], [r2].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r2].[Rating], [r2].[UserId]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) AS [c], CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END AS [c0]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) DESC, CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r2] ON [b0].[Id] = [r2].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[c0] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id]
2025-09-20 04:02:55.588 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (12ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r].[Id], [r].[BookId], [r].[Comment], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[IsApproved], [r].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r].[Rating], [r].[UserId]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY [b].[CreatedAt] DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r] ON [b0].[Id] = [r].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[CreatedAt] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id]
2025-09-20 04:02:55.606 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (16ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r].[Id], [r].[BookId], [r].[Comment], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[IsApproved], [r].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r].[Rating], [r].[UserId], [o0].[Id], [o0].[BookId], [o0].[OrderId], [o0].[Quantity], [o0].[Total], [o0].[UnitPrice]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM([o].[Quantity]), 0)
        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) AS [c]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM([o].[Quantity]), 0)
        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r] ON [b0].[Id] = [r].[BookId]
LEFT JOIN [OrderItems] AS [o0] ON [b0].[Id] = [o0].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id], [r].[Id]

SELECT [r0].[Id], [r0].[BookId], [r0].[Comment], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[IsApproved], [r0].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r0].[Rating], [r0].[UserId], [a].[Id], [a].[AccessFailedCount], [a].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a].[CreatedAt], [a].[Email], [a].[EmailConfirmed], [a].[LockoutEnabled], [a].[LockoutEnd], [a].[Name], [a].[NormalizedEmail], [a].[NormalizedUserName], [a].[PasswordHash], [a].[PhoneNumber], [a].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a].[SecurityStamp], [a].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a].[UserName], [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId]
FROM (
    SELECT [r].[Id], [r].[BookId], [r].[Comment], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[IsApproved], [r].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r].[Rating], [r].[UserId]
    FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
    WHERE [r].[IsApproved] = CAST(1 AS bit)
    ORDER BY [r].[CreatedAt] DESC
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [r0]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [r0].[UserId] = [a].[Id]

INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
ORDER BY [r0].[CreatedAt] DESC

        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) AS [c]

    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0

SELECT [r0].[Id], [r0].[BookId], [r0].[Comment], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[IsApproved], [r0].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r0].[Rating], [r0].[UserId], [a].[Id], [a].[AccessFailedCount], [a].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a].[CreatedAt], [a].[Email], [a].[EmailConfirmed], [a].[LockoutEnabled], [a].[LockoutEnd], [a].[Name], [a].[NormalizedEmail], [a].[NormalizedUserName], [a].[PasswordHash], [a].[PhoneNumber], [a].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a].[SecurityStamp], [a].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a].[UserName], [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId]

FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) AS [c], CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END AS [c0]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) DESC, CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r2] ON [b0].[Id] = [r2].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[c0] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id]

ORDER BY [b0].[CreatedAt] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id]
2025-09-20 04:14:14.398 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (6ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r].[Id], [r].[BookId], [r].[Comment], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[IsApproved], [r].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r].[Rating], [r].[UserId], [o0].[Id], [o0].[BookId], [o0].[OrderId], [o0].[Quantity], [o0].[Total], [o0].[UnitPrice]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM([o].[Quantity]), 0)
        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) AS [c]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM([o].[Quantity]), 0)
        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r] ON [b0].[Id] = [r].[BookId]
LEFT JOIN [OrderItems] AS [o0] ON [b0].[Id] = [o0].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id], [r].[Id]

SELECT [r0].[Id], [r0].[BookId], [r0].[Comment], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[IsApproved], [r0].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r0].[Rating], [r0].[UserId], [a].[Id], [a].[AccessFailedCount], [a].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a].[CreatedAt], [a].[Email], [a].[EmailConfirmed], [a].[LockoutEnabled], [a].[LockoutEnd], [a].[Name], [a].[NormalizedEmail], [a].[NormalizedUserName], [a].[PasswordHash], [a].[PhoneNumber], [a].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a].[SecurityStamp], [a].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a].[UserName], [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId]
FROM (
    SELECT [r].[Id], [r].[BookId], [r].[Comment], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[IsApproved], [r].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r].[Rating], [r].[UserId]
    FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
    WHERE [r].[IsApproved] = CAST(1 AS bit)
    ORDER BY [r].[CreatedAt] DESC
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [r0]

ORDER BY [r0].[CreatedAt] DESC

SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r2].[Id], [r2].[BookId], [r2].[Comment], [r2].[CreatedAt], [r2].[IsApproved], [r2].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r2].[Rating], [r2].[UserId]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) AS [c], CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END AS [c0]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) DESC, CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r2] ON [b0].[Id] = [r2].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[c0] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id]

SELECT [r0].[Id], [r0].[BookId], [r0].[Comment], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[IsApproved], [r0].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r0].[Rating], [r0].[UserId], [a].[Id], [a].[AccessFailedCount], [a].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a].[CreatedAt], [a].[Email], [a].[EmailConfirmed], [a].[LockoutEnabled], [a].[LockoutEnd], [a].[Name], [a].[NormalizedEmail], [a].[NormalizedUserName], [a].[PasswordHash], [a].[PhoneNumber], [a].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a].[SecurityStamp], [a].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a].[UserName], [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId]
FROM (
    SELECT [r].[Id], [r].[BookId], [r].[Comment], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[IsApproved], [r].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r].[Rating], [r].[UserId]
    FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
    WHERE [r].[IsApproved] = CAST(1 AS bit)
    ORDER BY [r].[CreatedAt] DESC
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [r0]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [r0].[UserId] = [a].[Id]
INNER JOIN [Books] AS [b] ON [r0].[BookId] = [b].[Id]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
ORDER BY [r0].[CreatedAt] DESC

    SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt]

SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r2].[Id], [r2].[BookId], [r2].[Comment], [r2].[CreatedAt], [r2].[IsApproved], [r2].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r2].[Rating], [r2].[UserId]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) AS [c], CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END AS [c0]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) DESC, CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r2] ON [b0].[Id] = [r2].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[c0] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id]

SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r].[Id], [r].[BookId], [r].[Comment], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[IsApproved], [r].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r].[Rating], [r].[UserId], [o0].[Id], [o0].[BookId], [o0].[OrderId], [o0].[Quantity], [o0].[Total], [o0].[UnitPrice]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM([o].[Quantity]), 0)
        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) AS [c]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM([o].[Quantity]), 0)
        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r] ON [b0].[Id] = [r].[BookId]
LEFT JOIN [OrderItems] AS [o0] ON [b0].[Id] = [o0].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id], [r].[Id]

    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (

        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) AS [c], CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (

            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0

        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) DESC, CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1

FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (

        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) AS [c]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM([o].[Quantity]), 0)
        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) DESC
) AS [b0]

SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r2].[Id], [r2].[BookId], [r2].[Comment], [r2].[CreatedAt], [r2].[IsApproved], [r2].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r2].[Rating], [r2].[UserId]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) AS [c], CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END AS [c0]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) DESC, CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r2] ON [b0].[Id] = [r2].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[c0] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id]

SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r].[Id], [r].[BookId], [r].[Comment], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[IsApproved], [r].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r].[Rating], [r].[UserId], [o0].[Id], [o0].[BookId], [o0].[OrderId], [o0].[Quantity], [o0].[Total], [o0].[UnitPrice]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM([o].[Quantity]), 0)
        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) AS [c]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM([o].[Quantity]), 0)
        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r] ON [b0].[Id] = [r].[BookId]
LEFT JOIN [OrderItems] AS [o0] ON [b0].[Id] = [o0].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id], [r].[Id]

SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r].[Id], [r].[BookId], [r].[Comment], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[IsApproved], [r].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r].[Rating], [r].[UserId], [o0].[Id], [o0].[BookId], [o0].[OrderId], [o0].[Quantity], [o0].[Total], [o0].[UnitPrice]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM([o].[Quantity]), 0)
        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) AS [c]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM([o].[Quantity]), 0)
        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r] ON [b0].[Id] = [r].[BookId]
LEFT JOIN [OrderItems] AS [o0] ON [b0].[Id] = [o0].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id], [r].[Id]

SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r2].[Id], [r2].[BookId], [r2].[Comment], [r2].[CreatedAt], [r2].[IsApproved], [r2].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r2].[Rating], [r2].[UserId]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) AS [c], CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END AS [c0]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) DESC, CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r2] ON [b0].[Id] = [r2].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[c0] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id]

FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) AS [c], CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END AS [c0]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) DESC, CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r2] ON [b0].[Id] = [r2].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[c0] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id]

SELECT [r0].[Id], [r0].[BookId], [r0].[Comment], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[IsApproved], [r0].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r0].[Rating], [r0].[UserId], [a].[Id], [a].[AccessFailedCount], [a].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a].[CreatedAt], [a].[Email], [a].[EmailConfirmed], [a].[LockoutEnabled], [a].[LockoutEnd], [a].[Name], [a].[NormalizedEmail], [a].[NormalizedUserName], [a].[PasswordHash], [a].[PhoneNumber], [a].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a].[SecurityStamp], [a].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a].[UserName], [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId]
FROM (
    SELECT [r].[Id], [r].[BookId], [r].[Comment], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[IsApproved], [r].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r].[Rating], [r].[UserId]
    FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
    WHERE [r].[IsApproved] = CAST(1 AS bit)
    ORDER BY [r].[CreatedAt] DESC
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [r0]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [r0].[UserId] = [a].[Id]

INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
ORDER BY [r0].[CreatedAt] DESC

FROM (
    SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt]

    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)
    ORDER BY [b].[Title]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [b0]

SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r2].[Id], [r2].[BookId], [r2].[Comment], [r2].[CreatedAt], [r2].[IsApproved], [r2].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r2].[Rating], [r2].[UserId]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) AS [c], CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END AS [c0]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) DESC, CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r2] ON [b0].[Id] = [r2].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[c0] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id]

SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r].[Id], [r].[BookId], [r].[Comment], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[IsApproved], [r].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r].[Rating], [r].[UserId], [o0].[Id], [o0].[BookId], [o0].[OrderId], [o0].[Quantity], [o0].[Total], [o0].[UnitPrice]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM([o].[Quantity]), 0)
        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) AS [c]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM([o].[Quantity]), 0)
        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r] ON [b0].[Id] = [r].[BookId]
LEFT JOIN [OrderItems] AS [o0] ON [b0].[Id] = [o0].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id], [r].[Id]

            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r2] ON [b0].[Id] = [r2].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[c0] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id]

        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) AS [c]

    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (

        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) AS [c], CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END AS [c0]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) DESC, CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))

            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END DESC

LEFT JOIN [Categories] AS [c0] ON [c].[ParentCategoryId] = [c0].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Books] AS [b] ON [c].[Id] = [b].[CategoryId]
LEFT JOIN [Categories] AS [c1] ON [c].[Id] = [c1].[ParentCategoryId]
ORDER BY [c].[Name], [c].[Id], [c0].[Id], [b].[Id]

SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r].[Id], [r].[BookId], [r].[Comment], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[IsApproved], [r].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r].[Rating], [r].[UserId]
FROM (
    SELECT [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit)
    ORDER BY [b].[Title]
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r] ON [b0].[Id] = [r].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[Title], [b0].[Id], [c].[Id]

SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r2].[Id], [r2].[BookId], [r2].[Comment], [r2].[CreatedAt], [r2].[IsApproved], [r2].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r2].[Rating], [r2].[UserId]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) AS [c], CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END AS [c0]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) DESC, CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r2] ON [b0].[Id] = [r2].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[c0] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id]

        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) AS [c]

    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM([o].[Quantity]), 0)
        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) DESC
) AS [b0]

    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) AS [c], CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END AS [c0]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) DESC, CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END DESC
) AS [b0]

FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) AS [c], CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END AS [c0]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) DESC, CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r2] ON [b0].[Id] = [r2].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[c0] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id]

    SELECT [r].[Id], [r].[BookId], [r].[Comment], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[IsApproved], [r].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r].[Rating], [r].[UserId]
    FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
    WHERE [r].[IsApproved] = CAST(1 AS bit)
    ORDER BY [r].[CreatedAt] DESC
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [r0]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [r0].[UserId] = [a].[Id]
INNER JOIN [Books] AS [b] ON [r0].[BookId] = [b].[Id]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
ORDER BY [r0].[CreatedAt] DESC

LEFT JOIN [Categories] AS [c0] ON [c].[ParentCategoryId] = [c0].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Books] AS [b] ON [c].[Id] = [b].[CategoryId]

SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r2].[Id], [r2].[BookId], [r2].[Comment], [r2].[CreatedAt], [r2].[IsApproved], [r2].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r2].[Rating], [r2].[UserId]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) AS [c], CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END AS [c0]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) DESC, CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r2] ON [b0].[Id] = [r2].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[c0] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id]

SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r].[Id], [r].[BookId], [r].[Comment], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[IsApproved], [r].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r].[Rating], [r].[UserId], [o0].[Id], [o0].[BookId], [o0].[OrderId], [o0].[Quantity], [o0].[Total], [o0].[UnitPrice]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM([o].[Quantity]), 0)
        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) AS [c]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM([o].[Quantity]), 0)
        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r] ON [b0].[Id] = [r].[BookId]
LEFT JOIN [OrderItems] AS [o0] ON [b0].[Id] = [o0].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id], [r].[Id]

2025-09-20 04:19:33.126 +07:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (92ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r].[Id], [r].[BookId], [r].[Comment], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[IsApproved], [r].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r].[Rating], [r].[UserId], [o0].[Id], [o0].[BookId], [o0].[OrderId], [o0].[Quantity], [o0].[Total], [o0].[UnitPrice]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM([o].[Quantity]), 0)
        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) AS [c]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COALESCE(SUM([o].[Quantity]), 0)
        FROM [OrderItems] AS [o]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [o].[BookId]) DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r] ON [b0].[Id] = [r].[BookId]
LEFT JOIN [OrderItems] AS [o0] ON [b0].[Id] = [o0].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id], [r].[Id]

SELECT [r0].[Id], [r0].[BookId], [r0].[Comment], [r0].[CreatedAt], [r0].[IsApproved], [r0].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r0].[Rating], [r0].[UserId], [a].[Id], [a].[AccessFailedCount], [a].[ConcurrencyStamp], [a].[CreatedAt], [a].[Email], [a].[EmailConfirmed], [a].[LockoutEnabled], [a].[LockoutEnd], [a].[Name], [a].[NormalizedEmail], [a].[NormalizedUserName], [a].[PasswordHash], [a].[PhoneNumber], [a].[PhoneNumberConfirmed], [a].[SecurityStamp], [a].[TwoFactorEnabled], [a].[UserName], [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId]
FROM (
    SELECT [r].[Id], [r].[BookId], [r].[Comment], [r].[CreatedAt], [r].[IsApproved], [r].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r].[Rating], [r].[UserId]
    FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
    WHERE [r].[IsApproved] = CAST(1 AS bit)
    ORDER BY [r].[CreatedAt] DESC
    OFFSET @__p_0 ROWS FETCH NEXT @__p_1 ROWS ONLY
) AS [r0]
INNER JOIN [AspNetUsers] AS [a] ON [r0].[UserId] = [a].[Id]
INNER JOIN [Books] AS [b] ON [r0].[BookId] = [b].[Id]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
ORDER BY [r0].[CreatedAt] DESC

SELECT [b0].[Id], [b0].[Author], [b0].[CategoryId], [b0].[CreatedAt], [b0].[Description], [b0].[DiscountPrice], [b0].[ImageContentType], [b0].[ImageFileName], [b0].[ImageFileSize], [b0].[ImageUrl], [b0].[IsActive], [b0].[Language], [b0].[PageCount], [b0].[Price], [b0].[PublishDate], [b0].[Publisher], [b0].[StockQuantity], [b0].[Title], [b0].[UpdatedAt], [c].[Id], [c].[CreatedAt], [c].[Description], [c].[ImageUrl], [c].[IsActive], [c].[Name], [c].[ParentCategoryId], [r2].[Id], [r2].[BookId], [r2].[Comment], [r2].[CreatedAt], [r2].[IsApproved], [r2].[IsVerifiedPurchase], [r2].[Rating], [r2].[UserId]
FROM (
    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) AS [c], CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END AS [c0]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) DESC, CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r2] ON [b0].[Id] = [r2].[BookId]
ORDER BY [b0].[c] DESC, [b0].[c0] DESC, [b0].[Id], [c].[Id]

    SELECT TOP(@__p_0) [b].[Id], [b].[Author], [b].[CategoryId], [b].[CreatedAt], [b].[Description], [b].[DiscountPrice], [b].[ImageContentType], [b].[ImageFileName], [b].[ImageFileSize], [b].[ImageUrl], [b].[IsActive], [b].[Language], [b].[PageCount], [b].[Price], [b].[PublishDate], [b].[Publisher], [b].[StockQuantity], [b].[Title], [b].[UpdatedAt], (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) AS [c], CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END AS [c0]
    FROM [Books] AS [b]
    WHERE [b].[IsActive] = CAST(1 AS bit) AND [b].[StockQuantity] > 0
    ORDER BY (
        SELECT COUNT(*)
        FROM [Reviews] AS [r]
        WHERE [b].[Id] = [r].[BookId]) DESC, CASE
        WHEN EXISTS (
            SELECT 1
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r0]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r0].[BookId]) THEN (
            SELECT AVG(CAST([r1].[Rating] AS float))
            FROM [Reviews] AS [r1]
            WHERE [b].[Id] = [r1].[BookId])
        ELSE 0.0E0
    END DESC
) AS [b0]
INNER JOIN [Categories] AS [c] ON [b0].[CategoryId] = [c].[Id]
LEFT JOIN [Reviews] AS [r2] ON [b0].[Id] = [r2].[BookId]
